name: Jenny WG (@miss_jwo@mastodon.social)
summary:
I don’t need a portable monitor but after seeing on in action and working from my in laws for the day; I kind of like the idea of a portable monitor that I can grab out my bag for when I’m on the road. 

today; it would have saved me some stupid mistakes because I kept switching windows. 

Please convince me this is a bad idea.
